info.name: KimCartoon Another No-Ads
info.description: Just another undetectable ad blocker for KissCartoon.me. This can block most ads except for the two big ones ones  on the sides of the page.
info.additionalInfo:
1st Release - nothing to say, simple code.
2nd Release - Updated to reflected sites new ad code and domain name

data.title: They blocked the big ads inline.
